data.description:
Candidates must be based within proximity of one of 2-TIMES office locations: Hong Kong (central), Singapore (Rochor), or Melbourne (CBD). 

Reporting to our VP of Technology, and working alongside our team of designers, developers and data scientists, the Head of Product will create and develop 2-TIMES’ online luxury go-to-market (GTM) strategy for all overarching digital product and key functionality launches – owning the end-to-end process from ideation and prioritization, to release management, supportability, and iteration. 

Managing both the short & long-term vision product roadmaps of 2-TIMES’ multi-platform content and eCommerce systems, he/she/they will need to champion the changing voice of our users; assessing the current state of our digital products, and identifying ways to transform our existing tech assets, while developing cases for implementing innovative new solutions that need to be built or bought in order to make immediate, needle-moving impact.

Responsibilities 

· Serve as the product lead for 2-TIMES, driving the strategy and complete product development lifecycle across 2-TIMES’ web, mobile, and microsite digital product portfolio 

· Ideating market disrupting technologies and products, pitching to leadership, and executing if approved, with respect to target market segments, latent needs, competitive landscape, customer ecosystem, and purchasing patterns

· Be a functional expert in building world class subscription-based (private client eCommerce) technology across conception, feature design, user interface (UI) design, user experience (UX), and ongoing digital platform management

· Researching, planning, and delivering process improvements in alignment with departmental leadership, and fostering adoption of recommendations by collaborating with team managers 

· Evaluating and refining our pricing strategy, especially when new features are introduced; establishing KPI’s and monitoring launched features to determine the value being delivered to customers 

· Mentoring the existing and future product and customer relationship management (CRM) team members — working closely with operations and design teams to identify creative solutions to customers problems, following-up case queues, report outs on strategic initiatives, and ongoing digital/tech programs 

Requirements 

· Bachelor’s and/or Master’s degree from a top-tier university in computer science, engineering and/or marketing 

· 7+ years of experience creating, testing and launching innovative interfaces, mid-to-large scale websites and applications. Exposure to the competitive landscape for luxury consumers, coupled with a sensitivity for global fashion platforms & marketplaces is highly regarded

· Curiosity, critical thinking, and the ability to learn quickly; with a penchant for data and continuously researching new capabilities 

· Deep product development expertise and understanding of enterprise platforms, APIs, and micro-services including: Segment, Heap, Clearbit, Kompyte, InVision, etc.

· Familiarity with account based marketing (ABM) tools counting: Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Bizible/Marketo, HubSpot, Demandbase, etc.

· Proficiency using BI tools, project management, video conferencing software including: SQL, Qlik, Tableau, Notion, Slack, Whereby, Teams, etc.

· Native in English is a must, with professional language fluency in Mandarin and/or Cantonese preferred 

2-TIMES will not enter into any commercial undertaking/s with recruiters or agencies

company_object.name: 2-TIMES
company_object.long_description:
2-TIMES is an invite-only luxury online retailer and event-based private shopping service.

Our split concept comprises both eCommerce and branded content platforms that work in unison to select and connect our handpicked community of private clients, luxury brands and contemporary art partners. 

Co-Founded by twin brothers Alex and Luke Anton, the 2-TIMES Group presently operates across Asia Pacific headquarters spanning Hong Kong, Singapore, and Australia.

data.description:
Company Description

Exlab Management Consultancy specializes in driving business efficiency and product innovation in the health industry. The team partners with organizations to empower them, fostering innovation and executing strategic solutions to their most critical challenges.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Senior Manager Product Strategy in the healthcare industry. The Senior Manager will be responsible for driving product strategy, conducting market research, utilizing analytical skills, product management, and strategic planning on a day-to-day basis.

Qualifications

* Product Strategy and Product Management skills
* Market Research and Analytical Skills
* Experience in Strategic Planning
* Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities
* Excellent communication and leadership skills
* Ability to work independently and remotely
* Experience in the health industry is a plus
* Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Healthcare, or related field

Position Overview:

The Technical Director of Product Management will be responsible for managing LocAI's internal platform. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, strategic vision, and hands-on experience in software development. The successful candidate will drive the creation of internal products, ensure cross-product synergies, and manage the entire requirements process from gathering to prioritization and documentation.

Key Responsibilities:

* Manage and lead the development of LocAI's internal platform, ensuring alignment with company goals and objectives.
* Create and maintain internal products, ensuring they meet the highest standards of quality and functionality.
* Ensure cross-product synergies and integration within the LocAI ecosystem.
* Gather and prioritize requirements from stakeholders, write detailed requirements documents, and work closely with internal engineering teams.
* Improve current generation products and define the next generation of products.
* Write documentation and user stories, especially during the initial phase until additional team members are hired.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time and within budget.

Qualifications:

* A minimum of 8 years of experience in product management.
* Strong technical background with prior hands-on software development experience.
* Proven ability to manage backend products and build baseline platforms.
* Excellent requirements management skills, including gathering, prioritizing, and documenting requirements.
* Ability to write clear and comprehensive documentation and user stories.
* Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
* Self-motivated and able to work independently in a fast-paced environment.

Preferred Skills:

* Experience in AI or related technologies.
* Prior experience in a startup environment.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies and project management tools.
* Prior experience as a software engineer.

With a relentless focus on speed, delivery, alignment, and ownership, we're not just developing technology but building a future where AI is synonymous with advancement and accessibility.

data.description:
Senior Product Manager – Crypto Exchange (CEX)

This role is paying 40,000 - 55,000 AED a month + Bonus + Benefits

**You must have previous experience of Product Management within a Crypto Exchange.**

Company Overview: 

Our client is at the forefront of technology innovation, driving forward-thinking solutions in the crypto and payment gateway space dedicated to delivering innovative Crypto trading solutions,

We are looking for a Senior Product Manager to be the spearhead in Product Managing and leading the strategic execution of the centralized crypto-exchange (CEX) platform. .

Platform Overview:

* Trading Engine: Ensuring robust, high-volume trading capabilities with state-of-the-art performance and minimal latency.
* User Accounts: Managing secure and efficient user registration and authentication.
* Currency Pairs: Facilitating trading across a broad spectrum of cryptocurrency pairs, including major and exotic pairs.
* Order Management: Supporting multiple order types to cater to various trading strategies.
* Liquidity Solutions: Maintaining optimal liquidity to ensure stable market conditions and fair pricing.
* Security Protocols: Implementing stringent security measures to safeguard user assets and data.
* Regulatory Compliance: Complying with international financial regulations, maintaining high standards of KYC and AML protocols.

Key Responsibilities:

* Strategic Planning and Execution: Develop and execute a clear, detailed product roadmap and strategy that aligns with business objectives and market needs.
* Project Management: Utilize project management tools such as JIRA, Confluence, Miro, and Slack to meticulously plan, track, and deliver projects on schedule and within budget.
* Operational Discipline: Maintain strict adherence to timelines and budget constraints, ensuring all product initiatives are executed with precision.
* Customer-Centric Development: Address customer pain points through strategic product design and functionality enhancements to improve user experience and satisfaction.
* Profitability and Efficiency: Focus on launching features that enhance business profitability and operational efficiency.
* Quality Assurance: Ensure the highest quality of deliverables through rigorous QA processes and continuous monitoring.
* Performance Metrics: Utilize data to track product performance and make informed decisions to drive continuous improvement.
* Stakeholder Engagement: Work closely with internal and external stakeholders to ensure alignment and transparency throughout the product lifecycle.

Qualifications:

* Proven experience in product management where you have led the strategic execution and product management of a Crypto Exchange (CEX)
* Strong technical background with a deep understanding of crypto trading platforms.
* Exceptional planning and organizational skills with a disciplined approach to project management.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Demonstrated ability to deliver projects on time and within budget.

What they Offer:

* A dynamic and innovative work environment in the heart of Dubai.
* Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
* Competitive salary and benefits package with potential Equity package
* The chance to be part of a leading company in the crypto exchange industry.

Please apply now with your latest cv.

data.description:
Company Description

Exlab Management Consultancy is a leading organization specializing in driving business efficiency and product innovation. We partner with organizations to empower them, foster innovation, and execute strategic solutions to their most critical challenges. Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional results and helping businesses thrive.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Director of Product Management. As the Director of Product Management, you will be responsible for driving product strategy, leading teams, and managing projects. You will be responsible for overseeing the entire product lifecycle, from concept to launch, and ensuring the success of our products in the market. This role requires strong leadership skills, strategic thinking, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Qualifications

* Product Strategy and Product Management skills
* Background in product lifecycle management.
* Analytical skills and ability to gather and interpret data
* Team leadership and ability to motivate and inspire teams
* Project management skills and ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
* Excellent communication and presentation skills
* Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities
* Experience in the consultancy industry is a plus
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field

data.job_title: Regional Head of Growth and Solutions - Air Product
data.description:
Position: Regional Head of Growth and Solutions

Location: Candidates can be based at any location across IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa).

Purpose:

In this pivotal role, your mission is to spearhead the development, implementation, and maintenance of processes, personnel, and solutions essential for the efficient handling of intricate, multi-regional, and multi-modal customer Requests for Quote (RFQ). Your responsibilities extend to fostering seamless collaboration with product experts worldwide, acting as a conduit to streamline their guidance and product strategy. This, in turn, influences our pricing offers to clients through the evolution of logical pricing processes and cutting-edge technology. Your strategic approach will be instrumental in elevating our responsiveness to the dynamic demands of the global marketplace.

Position: Regional Head of Growth and Solutions

Role Overview:

As the Head of Growth and Solutions, you will play a pivotal role in developing, implementing, and maintaining processes, staff, and solutions to effectively respond to complex, multi-regional, multi-modal customer Requests for Quote (RFQ) in our dynamic global environment. You will serve as a crucial liaison with product experts worldwide, ensuring seamless collaboration to guide product strategy and influence our pricing processes through technological advancements.

Responsibilities:

* Execute the product's strategic initiatives for global growth in alignment with annual budgeted revenues and volumes.
* Contribute to the establishment of the Go-to-Market and Pricing strategy, leading the price-setting process across the product, especially for large strategic RFQ opportunities.
* Drive the Go-To-Market process in line with the product's market strategy, consolidating and sharing market information, including development, competition, customer behavior, and pricing trends.
* Participate in setting annual sales targets, collaborating with Finance and Sales to compile growth plan initiatives for achieving budgeted growth in GP & Volumes.
* Ensure consistent monthly delivery of budgeted GP and volume numbers by actively monitoring the global sales pipeline, initiating corrective actions when necessary.
* Act as a key driver for Power Trade Lane transactions and growth.
* Collaborate with the sales enablement team, regional/area product heads, and the product BPO to maintain updated product sales material, conduct training events, and support tenders with necessary input.
* Provide essential product input for marketing and commercial activities.

Accountable For:

* Delivering and executing the annual plan for strategic growth initiatives.
* Execution of pricing and go-to-market strategy.
* Driving annual top-line and volume growth for the product.
* Delivering product and sales information and material.

Consulted About:

* New product development plans.
* Margin improvement initiatives.

Key Metrics:

Shared:

* Product P&L.
* Product NPS.

Individual:

* Product Volume.
* Execution of the annual product growth plan.

Organizational:

* Directly supervised by the Regional Head of Air Freight.
* Functional (dotted line) reports to Area Tenders/Global RFQ.

Key Interdependencies:

* Center Air & LCL Organization.
* Center Growth & Solutions.
* Sales enablement.
* Area Product heads.
* Customer Experience (CX).
* Sales.
* Business Process Excellence (BPE).
* Go-To-Market (GTM).

External Stakeholders:

* Customers.

Critical Competencies:

* Extensive technical product knowledge, including experience in product pricing and go-to-market strategies.
* Customer-facing engagement and presentation skills.
* Understanding of key profitability drivers in logistics and supply chain management.
* Strong ability to facilitate cross-functional decision-making and execution.
* Excellent communication skills.

Maersk is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace, and we embrace different styles of thinking. Maersk is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applicants without regard to race, colour, gender, sex, age, religion, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy or parental leave, veteran status, gender identity, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with all legal requirements.

We are happy to support your need for any adjustments during the application and hiring process. If you need special assistance or an accommodation to use our website, apply for a position, or to perform a job, please contact us by emailing accommodationrequests@maersk.com.

A.P. Moller - Maersk is an integrated transport and logistics company; going all the way, together, for our customers and society. ALL THE WAY is our commitment to connect the world so that everyone has both the possibility and the ability to trade, grow and thrive.
The company employs roughly 110.000 employees across operations in 130 countries.

data.description:
Job Objective:

We are looking for an experienced Head of Product, who is passionate about building products that our Customers will Love. This is a dynamic and fast-paced environment with cross-functional teams to work, design, build and roll-out products that deliver the company’s vision and strategy deployment. As a Head of Product - Innovation , you will lead our product life cycle to ensure our product success in the market that today’s custom demanding. You will have clear streaming media product understanding to maintain product performance and constantly addressing & developing new innovations. Setting up an innovation cycle, and understanding the streaming media industry is the core to gain further market lead as the key KPI. This position requires exercising independent judgment to perform the responsibilities described

below.

Responsibilities:

* Strategic planning and management of the entire product cycle and product performance across platforms.
* Full understanding of different media content consumption types (AVOD, SVOD, FAST, Hybrid IP/Sat, Broadcast Media)
* Pre-defining and alignment of the vision, strategy and roadmap, in order to establish the company as Market leader in the Entertainment & Media industry
* Create and present visionary product innovations, support with decision proposals and build on business cases for market launches
* You will be responsible for strategic vendor management, partnerships and lead necessary contract negotiations in alignment with Product Management Director Level.
* Monitoring company’s relevant KPIs and control of the product measures to achieve the objectives set with Team
* Provide deep understanding of user experience, Product Advertisement solutions to identify and fill product gaps
* Generate new ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience and drive growth
* Create buy-in for the product vision both internally and with stakeholders
* Provide support and expertise on product design mythology and experience (UI/UX)
* Translate product strategy into detailed product requirements and prototypes
* Scope and prioritize activities based on business and customer impact
* Work closely with technology teams and project management team to deliver on time and optimal resources
* Drive product launches including working with other product management team members, external parties and customers
* Lead the assigned product teams to support, motivate, couch and provide direction to achieve steady improvements in each product stream area

Requirements:

* At least 8+ years of experience in the field of product management, software development, streaming media product & platform technology, product marketing, advertisement
* At least 3+ years of leadership experience in an international environment
* MS/BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Media /Advertisement or equivalent,
* Relevant certifications and trainings to prove the competence in required field
* Excellent communication skills (written/verbal) in English language in order to communicate
* with senior management as well as project members and stakeholders
* Strong analytical, strategic and coordinating skills
* Sound knowledge and understanding of business and technology in the broadcast-media,
* streaming-media ( Video OTT), Telco/IPTV
* A Product Management certification is an advantage, excellent expert in application development methodologies, design creativity and methodology, user experience concept in video consumption application and useability
* Must have demonstrated experience dealing with immediate deadlines
* Must have excellent analytical, troubleshooting ability, with risk management to highlight
* upwards & management reporting
* Proven track record of managing all aspects of a successful product lifecycle
* Proven ability to develop product and effectively communicate recommendations to
* executive management, with collecting and assessing defined data
* Solid understanding in software development, micro-services, cloud-platform and API management ad app-build technologies
* Strong problem-solving skills and willingness with hands-on mentality to get work done

data.description:
Head of Product - Fully Remote 

Salary - 30,000 - 35,000AED + benefits dependent on experience

We are partnering with an incredible Start-up in the GCC region who have a remote first approach and are looking to hire a Head of Product to take lead on the Product roadmap. They are a diverse business with employees in over 20 different countries. They are backed by some incredible investors with strategies in place to become one of the worlds leading remote first business - they believe people should be able to work from anywhere, anytime and be trusted to get the job done around their own lives!

You will be:

* Leading the product roadmap.
* Manging a product team, attracting and mentoring product owners.
* Working closely with the engineering, design, marketing, and sales teams.
* Collaborating with marketing and sales on product launches.
* Advocating for user-friendly, intuitive product design.
* Tracking progress, assessing risks, coordinating delivery, and communicating contingency and mitigation strategies.

You will need:

* Extensive experience in product management at a high-growth B2B SaaS or Fintech companies.
* Experience leading teams of high-performing product managers/owners.
* Detail-oriented mindset with a strong emphasis on top-notch UI and UX.
* Proven experience overseeing all elements of the product development lifecycle.
* Ideally located within 4 hours of the EMEA region.

If you feel you are right for this role and have the relevant in region experience please apply!

company_object.name: Alnaas Advisory
company_object.long_description:
At Alnaas Advisory, we put the ‘Human’ back into HR, enhancing your company's attraction, engagement, and retention strategies. "Alnaas," meaning ‘People’ in Arabic, captures our focus on what truly matters.

We are a team of experienced HR and Talent leaders based in the Middle East, committed to the region's future. We help businesses thrive through effective people strategies, having advised some of the region's most successful companies. We ensure healthy cultures and competitive advantages through optimal talent attraction, engagement, and retention strategies.

Vision:
To be the leading partner for organizations in the Middle East, helping them elevate performance through a people-first approach.

Mission:
To empower Middle Eastern organizations to excel by unlocking their most valuable asset – their people. We enable businesses to invest in their employees, foster growth and innovation, and stay ahead of the competition.

Values:
- Integrity: We uphold the highest standards in all our actions.
- Client Focus: We provide exceptional services tailored to our clients' needs.
- Innovation: We continuously seek better solutions.
- Collaboration: We work together across boundaries to meet client needs.
- Excellence: We strive for excellence in everything we do.

Our Services Include:

Talent Attraction:
- Executive Search
- Recruitment Services
- On-demand recruiter subscriptions

Talent Engagement & Retention:
- Employer branding, onboarding/offboarding
- Compensation, Benefits, Total Rewards & ESOP benchmarking
- Performance Management
- Learning & Development
- Career Path Mapping & Organizational Design
- Technology, tools & data integration

At Alnaas Advisory, we partner with you to build exceptional teams and thriving workplace cultures. Let's work together to unlock your organization's full potential.

hiring_team.role: VP - Partnerships & Business Development | Transforming businesses with AI 💡

data.description:
Lisan is a deep tech company focused on bridging the gap between AI and institutions in the MENA region.

We are:

* Best Home-Grown Business from Mohammed Bin Rashid Innovation Fund (UAE).
* Best DeepTech Startup - IE Business School (Spain).
* Fastest growing AI company in the Middle East and Cyprus in the AI field by Deloitte.
Lisan specializes in developing cutting-edge productivity and quality improvement tools tailored for institutions in the MENA region. Our product suite includes a state-of-the-art institutional spelling and grammar checker for Arabic language, specialized AI models, monitoring, tracking, compliance, and analytical tools.

Senior Product Manager:

We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Product Manager to join our team. As a Senior Product Manager at Lisan, you will be at the front line of product development, playing a key role in defining product vision, managing project goals, and leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

Key Responsibilities:

* Define and articulate product vision and strategy.
* Develop and manage the product roadmap, prioritizing features based on value, urgency, revenue, and customer impact.
* Work with cross-functional teams including Data Scientists, Developers, Sales, Marketing to deliver high-quality products on time.
* Gather and evaluate feedback from customers, stakeholders, and the market to continually inform the product development process.
* Define user stories and acceptance criteria, and ensure clear communication of requirements to the development team.
* Monitor product performance to ensure customer satisfaction and ROI.
* Act as a primary point of contact for all queries related to the product.

Qualifications:

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, AI, Linguistics, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Product Owner, Product Manager, or similar role in a technology-focused company.
* Strong understanding of AI and natural language processing technologies and their applications.
* Experience working with Agile delivery methodologies.
* Skilled in conducting user research, usability tests, and A/B testing.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a proven ability to engage and influence cross-functional teams.
* Excellent communication skills in English and Arabic.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
* Experience with Agile methodologies, Scrum, or other project management frameworks such as Asana and Microsoft Project.

Preferred Skills:

* Certified in Agile methodologies (CSPO, SAFe PO/PM).
* Certified in UI/UX design (e.g., from Nielsen Norman Group, Interaction Design Foundation, or similar).
* Industrial or research experience in AI and NLP.
* Understanding of the cultural and business landscape in the Middle East.

Why Join Us? 

* Competitive Salaries: We offer attractive salaries to ensure our team members are well-compensated for their expertise and contributions.
* Equity Participation: Benefit from our Employee Stock Option Plan (ESOP) with allocations up to double your annual salary, giving you a stake in our success. 20% of the Company Shares are allocated to the team.
* Learning and Development: Access our extensive library of courses, projects, and learning materials. We dedicate hours for you to improve your skills and stay updated with the latest technologies and trends.
* Excellent Culture: Be part of a collaborative and innovative environment with a team of passionate professionals dedicated to making a difference. Work with tech-savvy professionals who have collectively written over 3.2 million lines of code alongside some of the best minds in the region.
* Regular Evaluations and Promotions: Participate in bi-annual (Phase) meetings where your progress is evaluated, with opportunities for promotions based on performance.
* Impactful Work: Contribute to projects that have a real impact on people’s lives, bridging technology and cultural gaps. 
* Innovation and Creativity: Engage in a fast startup work environment with no bureaucracy that encourages innovation and creativity, allowing you to bring your ideas to life and make a significant impact.
* Impact: Work on products and solutions that are used by institutions and businesses across the MENA region, contributing to the advancement of AI and technology in the region.
* Supportive Environment: A supportive work environment where your contributions are valued and your growth and development are prioritized.

data.job_title: Associate Vice President - Senior Product Manager

hiring_team.role: Senior Talent Attraction Specialist @ RAKBANK | Leadership Hiring

data.description:
RAKBANK, also known as the National Bank of Ras Al-Khaimah, is a Public Joint Stock Company based in the United Arab Emirates (UAE). It was founded in 1976 and is one of the oldest banks in the UAE. The Bank operates within retail and corporate banking, offering a range of services including personal and business banking, credit cards, loans, investment services, and wealth management.

In the recent years, the Bank has achieved significant milestones which includes being named as one of the world's best banks by Forbes ME (2022) and was awarded UAE's SME Bank of the year by the Asian Banking and Finance Awards. The Bank has been successful in achieving the highest profitability and lowest cost of risk since 2015. It has also seen significant growth in its acquiring business, card spending, and business loans.

Being on a transformational journey, in partnership with Honeywell, RAKBANK has also taken steps towards sustainability by reducing its overall energy consumption. We are a diverse team comprising of over 3,000 employees from across 58 countries. We make conscious efforts to build talented and diversified teams and encourage people to develop their full potential. We are committed to providing a working environment that promotes work-life balance, career development, recognition and security for the future.

In line with our strategy, a major part of our transformation journey is to future proof our bank and establish ourselves as a ‘Digital bank with human touch’, for our customers.

So, join us in co-creating the future of RAKBANK!

What You Will Be Doing

* Full ownership and responsibility for Cross Border Remittance Product Management. 
* Develop and execute the overall strategy for digital remittances and payments in alignment with the organization's goals.
* Drive innovation and stay abreast of industry trends to position our digital offerings competitively, identify gaps, develop and launch new/revamp products and propositions to enhance penetration, profitability, brand awareness and market share. 
* Lead the end-to-end product lifecycle, from ideation to implementation and ongoing optimization.
* Manage cross functional projects and work closely with engineers, UX experts and designers in order to build best-in-class products for customers.
* Ensure an awesome customer experience: Implement strategies to enhance the digital remittance and cardholder experience. 
* Analyze customer feedback and market trends to identify areas for improvement.
* Collaborate with technology teams to ensure seamless integration of digital remittance and card services with existing systems and platforms. Evaluate and recommend new technologies to enhance service capabilities.
* Identify and foster strategic partnerships to expand the reach and capabilities of digital remittance and card services. 
* Effectively manage relationships with vendors and third-party service providers. 
* Manage key strategic relationship with a leader in financial inclusion and wage payment services.

What You Should Have

* Progressive experience in digital payments, remittances, with demonstrated success in developing and launching digital financial products.
* Knowledge of regulatory requirements related to digital financial services.
* Strong leadership and strategic planning skills. 
* Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
* Proven ability to manage cross-functional teams and collaborate effectively. 
* Speak at least 3 languages.

What We Are Looking For

* Product Leader with over 10 years' experience, in remittances/cross border payments/financial inclusion.
* Bachelor's degree in business, Finance, or a related field; master's degree preferred.

What’s In It For You

* Pay for performance culture (Competitive and performance-linked compensation)
* Provision of medical care plan for your family and you
* Comprehensive Life insurance plan
* Diverse workforce and inclusive culture
* Career development and growth opportunities by design
* Work with the best minds in the field.
* Get opportunities to bring your whole self to the organization and perform to your best.

company_object.name: RAKBANK
company_object.long_description:
RAKBANK, also known as the National Bank of Ras Al Khaimah (P.J.S.C), is one of the oldest and most dynamic banks in the UAE. Founded in 1976, the Bank underwent a major transformation in 2001, with a shift in focus from Corporate Banking to Personal and Business Banking.

Today, the Bank offers a wide range of personal and business banking services throughout its 21 branches and its portfolio of electronic banking solutions, which include Telephone and Digital Banking. It also offers Sharia-compliant personal and business banking services via its Islamic Banking unit, RAKislamic.

RAKBANK is a public joint stock company, headquartered in the emirate of Ras Al Khaimah, in the UAE. Its Head Office is situated in the RAKBANK Building on Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road in Ras Al Khaimah. The Bank is 52.76% owned by the Government of Ras Al-Khaimah and its shares are publicly traded on ADX.
 
RAKBANK is a proud member of the UAE Banking Federation (UBF) and as such, abides by the UBF stipulated, Customer Charter for all member banks. We concur with the Customer Charter to promote trust and best practices across financial services industry, providing customers with clear guidelines about the standard of service they can expect from their banks.

For more information, visit www.rakbank.ae or contact the RAKBANK Call Centre on +9714 213 0000. You can also follow RAKBANK on Twitter @RAKBANKlive. Alternatively you can email us at contactus@rakbank.ae.
company_object.seo_description: Welcome to the official page of RAKBANK. Stay connected to know more about our ‘Simply Better’ banking solutions.
